project.description: A comprehensive library for validating JWT tokens in multi-issuer environments with focus on offline validation, providing sub-millisecond performance, automatic JWKS key management, and Quarkus extension for seamless integration.
project.description_reasoning: From README.adoc 'What is it?' section and Core Features list

oauth-sheriff-parent.responsibility: Root POM that coordinates build configuration, dependency management, and quality profiles for all child modules in the OAuth Sheriff project.
oauth-sheriff-parent.responsibility_reasoning: packaging=pom, root position, contains shared build configuration
oauth-sheriff-parent.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Parent POM module with no source files - no skill profiles needed

benchmarking.responsibility: Parent module for benchmarking that coordinates configuration for JMH micro-benchmarks and WRK integration benchmarks.
benchmarking.responsibility_reasoning: From pom.xml description, parent of benchmark modules
benchmarking.purpose_reasoning: packaging=pom, parent module for benchmark children
benchmarking.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Parent POM module with no source files - no skill profiles needed

benchmark-core.responsibility: Executes JMH micro-benchmarks for JWT token validation performance measuring throughput, latency, and memory allocation.
benchmark-core.responsibility_reasoning: From pom.xml description and package structure with benchmark classes
benchmark-core.purpose_reasoning: Contains JMH benchmark annotations and benchmark execution code
benchmark-core.key_dependencies_reasoning: JMH for benchmarking, JJWT for comparison baseline, HdrHistogram for latency. Internal: core library and shared benchmark infrastructure
benchmark-core.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Benchmark module - minimal skills, focus on JMH patterns

benchmark-integration-wrk.responsibility: Executes WRK-based HTTP load testing benchmarks against Quarkus endpoints to measure real-world JWT validation performance under load.
benchmark-integration-wrk.responsibility_reasoning: From pom.xml description mentioning WRK HTTP benchmarks with integration test infrastructure
benchmark-integration-wrk.purpose_reasoning: Contains WRK load testing integration and HTTP benchmark execution
benchmark-integration-wrk.key_dependencies_reasoning: Gson for WRK JSON output parsing, commons-io for file handling. Uses shared benchmark infrastructure.
benchmark-integration-wrk.skills_by_profile_reasoning: WRK integration benchmark module - minimal skills

benchmarking-common.responsibility: Provides shared JMH benchmarking infrastructure including base classes, metrics collection, report generation, and artifact publishing during benchmark execution.
benchmarking-common.responsibility_reasoning: From pom.xml description and 15 packages covering base, metrics, runner, report, model
benchmarking-common.purpose_reasoning: packaging=jar, shared by benchmark-core and benchmark-integration-wrk

de.cuioss.benchmarking.common.description: Root package providing benchmark infrastructure entry points and common utilities.

de.cuioss.benchmarking.common.runner.description: Provides benchmark runner implementations for executing JMH benchmarks with configurable options.

de.cuioss.benchmarking.common.report.description: Generates benchmark reports and publishes results to artifact repository.

benchmarking-common.key_dependencies_reasoning: JMH core for benchmarking, CUI tools for utilities, HdrHistogram for latency measurements, Gson for JSON output
benchmarking-common.skills_by_profile_reasoning: JMH benchmark library - removed java-cdi (no CDI), added benchmark-testing profile

oauth-sheriff-bom.responsibility: Provides a Bill of Materials (BOM) for dependency version management across OAuth Sheriff modules.
oauth-sheriff-bom.skills_by_profile_reasoning: BOM module with no source files - no skill profiles needed

oauth-sheriff-core.responsibility: Provides the core JWT token validation library with multi-issuer support, JWKS key management, validation pipelines, and domain models for tokens, claims, and validation contexts.
oauth-sheriff-core.responsibility_reasoning: From package-info.java and module structure with 19 packages covering pipeline, jwks, domain, cache
oauth-sheriff-core.purpose_reasoning: packaging=jar, no runtime deps, no main class, used as compile dependency

de.cuioss.sheriff.oauth.core.description: Main entry point providing TokenValidator for creating and validating tokens, IssuerConfig for issuer setup, and ParserConfig for parsing configuration.

de.cuioss.sheriff.oauth.core.pipeline.description: Implements the validation pipeline with pluggable validators for signature verification, claim validation, and expiration checking.

de.cuioss.sheriff.oauth.core.jwks.description: Handles JWKS (JSON Web Key Set) operations including key parsing, HTTP fetching, caching, and rotation support.

de.cuioss.sheriff.oauth.core.domain.description: Contains domain models for tokens (AccessToken, IdToken, RefreshToken), claims, validation contexts, and authorization results.

oauth-sheriff-core.key_dependencies_reasoning: cui-java-tools and cui-http for core utilities and HTTP, jakarta.json for JSON processing, dsl-json for high-perf JSON, jspecify for null-safety
oauth-sheriff-core.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Core library uses Lombok, JSpecify null-safety, CUI logging. Removed java-cdi (no CDI annotations). Added CUI-specific skills for logging and testing.

oauth-sheriff-quarkus-parent.responsibility: Parent module for Quarkus extension that provides shared Quarkus dependencies (core, arc, micrometer, security) and configuration for runtime and deployment modules.
oauth-sheriff-quarkus-parent.responsibility_reasoning: packaging=pom with Quarkus deps defined, parent of quarkus runtime and deployment
oauth-sheriff-quarkus-parent.purpose_reasoning: packaging=pom, parent for quarkus child modules
oauth-sheriff-quarkus-parent.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Parent POM module with no source files - no skill profiles needed

oauth-sheriff-quarkus.responsibility: Provides Quarkus runtime integration for JWT validation including CDI producers for token injection, @BearerAuth interceptors, Micrometer metrics integration, SmallRye health checks, and YAML configuration support.
oauth-sheriff-quarkus.responsibility_reasoning: From pom.xml description and packages: producer, interceptor, metrics, health, config
oauth-sheriff-quarkus.purpose_reasoning: Quarkus extension runtime with CDI producers and annotations

de.cuioss.sheriff.oauth.quarkus.producer.description: CDI producers for injecting validated BearerTokenResult into application code with scope configuration.

de.cuioss.sheriff.oauth.quarkus.intercep.description: Provides @BearerAuth interceptor for declarative security on JAX-RS endpoints with automatic error responses.

de.cuioss.sheriff.oauth.quarkus.config.description: Quarkus configuration bindings for issuer setup, JWKS endpoints, and validation parameters.

de.cuioss.sheriff.oauth.quarkus.metrics.description: Micrometer metrics integration for JWT validation monitoring including validation counts, latencies, and error rates.

oauth-sheriff-quarkus.key_dependencies_reasoning: Core Quarkus runtime deps for CDI, metrics, health, and REST. Depends on core validation library.
oauth-sheriff-quarkus.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Quarkus extension with heavy CDI usage - added java-cdi and java-cdi-quarkus, CUI logging/testing

oauth-sheriff-quarkus-devui.responsibility: Quarkus deployment module providing DevUI components for the OAuth Sheriff extension using Lit web components, with @BuildStep processors for build-time extension registration.
oauth-sheriff-quarkus-devui.responsibility_reasoning: Hybrid Maven+npm, contains deployment package with @BuildStep, Lit web components in src/main
oauth-sheriff-quarkus-devui.purpose_reasoning: Contains @BuildStep annotations for Quarkus build-time processing, -deployment artifact convention

de.cuioss.sheriff.oauth.quarkus.deployme.description: Quarkus deployment processors with @BuildStep annotations for extension registration and DevUI card configuration.

oauth-sheriff-quarkus-devui.key_dependencies_reasoning: Quarkus deployment SPIs for build-time processing and DevUI integration. Lit for web components. Depends on runtime module.
oauth-sheriff-quarkus-devui.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Hybrid module: Java for @BuildStep deployment code, JavaScript for Lit web components. Removed cypress (not used).

oauth-sheriff-quarkus-integration-tests.responsibility: Provides integration tests for the OAuth Sheriff Quarkus extension, testing against real Keycloak containers with HTTPS support, DevUI components, and native image builds.
oauth-sheriff-quarkus-integration-tests.responsibility_reasoning: From pom.xml description mentioning native container testing with HTTPS
oauth-sheriff-quarkus-integration-tests.purpose_reasoning: Contains *IT.java test files, test-only packaging, integration-tests profile

de.cuioss.sheriff.oauth.integration.description: Integration test infrastructure and test application setup for Quarkus testing.

de.cuioss.sheriff.oauth.integration.endp.description: JAX-RS test endpoints demonstrating @BearerAuth interceptor and token injection patterns.

oauth-sheriff-quarkus-integration-tests.key_dependencies_reasoning: Quarkus test framework, REST-assured for HTTP testing, DevUI test SPI. Tests runtime and deployment modules.
oauth-sheriff-quarkus-integration-tests.skills_by_profile_reasoning: Integration test module - only integration-testing profile. Quarkus CDI for test app, junit-integration for IT patterns.
